coreAttributes.name: Squirrel Java
coreAttributes.description: A plastic bottle of what looks to be some kind of coffee. A label on the front shows a squirrel-girl fingering herself over the top of a bottle just like this one; her juices dripping down into the coffee to provide some extra cream.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A soothing wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Unscrewing the cap from the bottle of Squirrel Java, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] it up to [npc.her] [npc.lips], before tilting [npc.her] head back and gulping down the liquid contained within. The coffee turns out to be far creamier than a typical blend, and after swallowing the last drop, [npc.nameIsFull] left with a sweet aftertaste lingering on [npc.her] [npc.tongue].
useDescriptions.otherUse: Unscrewing the cap from the bottle of Squirrel Java, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips] and [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.her] to gulp down the liquid contained within. The coffee turns out to be far creamier than a typical blend, and after swallowing the last drop, [npc2.nameIsFull] left with a sweet aftertaste lingering on [npc2.her] [npc2.tongue].
